description:
Avoiding chills is crucial when travelling in the cold. This lightweight base layer holds in your body heat and moves any sweat to the outside layer where can evaporate without cooling you down.

  • Tencel™ Lyocell and merino blend wicks moisture to keep you warm and dry
  • Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial
  • Fabric has 4-way stretch for unrestricted comfort
  • Underarm, back, and elbow panels vent excess heat
  • Raglan sleeves allow full range of motion
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Kombi Merino Mix Active Crew Top - Men's
